entries.title_d: The attack was led by an Inquisitor of the Empire. He's now trying to escape the lost battle, let's make sure that he pays for the attack!
entries.title: Endor system: Eliminate the escaping Inquisitor.
entries.quest_target_d: Inquisitors are always a dangerous foe. They are well trained, ruthless and have access to the best technology the Empire has to offer.
entries.quest_location_d: Even though the Imperial forces are confused by our strong counter attack, they still outnumber us and it will only be a moment before they regain morale.
entries.failed_escape: Bah, he got away! Return to base pilot.
entries.escort_wiped_out: Brother Extok Evin: < The escort is taken care of, now for the big prize! >
entries.escort_remaining: Brother Extok Evin: < Nice job pilot but don't let that Inquisitor escape! >
entries.assassinate_success: Splendid! This was truly a day of victories! Return to base for repairs and some well earned rest pilot.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Our reconnaissance ship has locked in on him. Intercept and terminate him pilot!
entries.arrival_phase_1: An Inquisitor was sent to oversee the annihilation of our shuttles. Now he's trying to escape, but we won't let him, will we?
